mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.dic_code, s.dic_name, s.dic_order, s.dic_type, s.create_time, s.creator, s.update_time, s.updator, s.is_del, s.pid, s.remarks, u.real_name AS creatorName, ui.real_name AS updatorName FROM sys_dic s LEFT JOIN user_info u ON s.creator = u.id LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON s.updator = ui.id WHERE s.is_del = 0 and s.pid is null
and s.dic_type LIKE '%${dicType}%'
and s.dic_name LIKE '%${dicName}%'
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dic SET dic_name = #{dicName}, dic_code = #{dicCode}, dic_order = #{dicOrder}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_time = #{updateTime}, updator = #{updator} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dic(id, dic_code, dic_name, dic_order, dic_type, create_time, creator, pid) VALUES (#{id}, #{dicCode}, #{dicName}, #{dicOrder}, #{dicType}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{pid})
mapper.select: SELECT dic_code, dic_name FROM sys_dic WHERE pid in (SELECT id FROM sys_dic WHERE dic_type = 'gender_type') ORDER BY dic_order ASC
